definition: The German word "Beginn" refers to the initial stage or starting point of something. It is commonly used to describe the commencement or onset of an event, activity, or process.

examples.german: Der Beginn des Films war sehr spannend.
examples.english: The beginning of the movie was very exciting.
The beginning of a new era.

examples.german: Der Beginn des Konzerts verzögerte sich um eine Stunde.
examples.english: The start of the concert was delayed by one hour.

examples.german: Am Beginn des Buches steht eine kurze Einführung.
examples.english: At the beginning of the book, there is a short introduction.
